name: Foliage March - LD34
description:
Defend your city against the inevitable march of nature! As the forest grows, so does civilization, push back that vegetation to where it belongs!

GearVR and Web or PC build coming soon!

Game:

Click on any tile two spots or less away from your own buildings to place building!

Use the right mouse to look around a little extra.

Place your own buildings next to forests, if you have 3 or more, you can convert the tile into a parking lot!

(Hint) Destroy the large tree to prevent the forest from growing!

Also try it in VR!
